DOC.HEADLINE: EXECUTIVE TRAVEL : SPOTLIGHT ON MEXICO
DOC.TEXT: Some useful addresses , phone_numbers and publications for doing business in Mexico : OFFICIAL FOREIGN_OFFICES The Embassy of Mexico can answer questions about visa requirements and offer advice about business and trade issues . Embassy of Mexico 1911 Pennsylvania Ave . N.W. Washington , D.C. 20006 ( 202 ) 728-1600 The local office of the Mexican Consulate can assist with common questions ; other questions may be referred to the Mexican Embassy . A consul investment official can provide basic information about doing business in Mexico . Mexican Consulate 2401 W . 6th St . Los Angeles , CA 90057 ( 213 ) 351-6800 The trade commissioner can provide information about industrial and investment opportunities in Mexico . Mexican Trade Commissioner 350 S . Figueroa St. , Suite 296 Los Angeles , CA 90071 ( 213 ) 628-1220 The Economic Consul can provide information about investment opportunities in Mexico . Mexican Consul for Economic Affairs 2401 W . 6th St . Los Angeles , CA 90057 ( 213 ) 351-6800 , ext . 249 Fax : ( 213 ) 389-9249 U.S. Embassy Paseo de la Reforma 305 Colinia Cuauhtemoc Mexico_City 06500 ( 52-5 ) 211-0042 TRADE CONTACTS These agencies can assist businesses , suggest locations or offer special incentives . Banamex-USA Bancorp 811 Wilshire Blvd. , 12th Floor Los Angeles , CA 90017 ( 213 ) 612-3700 Fax : ( 213 ) 612-3771 California Trade and Investment Office Reforma 450 , 4 Piso Mexico D.F. 06600 ( 52-5 ) 208-5161 Fax : ( 52-5 ) 208-5761 Chamber of National Industry Ave . San Antonio 256 Mexico D.F. 03849 ( 52-5 ) 563-3400 , ext . 168 Coordinating Council for International Business Homero No . 527 , 7 Piso Polanco Chapultepec Mexico D.F. 11560 ( 52-5 ) 250-7033 Fax : ( 52-5 ) 531-1590 Mexican Cultural Institute 125 Paseo de la Plaza , Suite 300 Los Angeles , CA 90012 ( 213 ) 624-3660 Fax : ( 213 ) 624-9387 Mexican Investment Board Reforma 915 Lomas de Chapultepec Mexico D.F. 11000 ( 52-5 ) 202-7804 Fax : ( 52-5 ) 202-7925 Mexican Government Tourism Office 10100 Santa Monica Blvd. , Suite 224 Los Angeles , CA 90067 ( 310 ) 203-8191 Fax : ( 310 ) 203-8316 Mexico_City Chamber_of_Commerce Paseo de la Reforma 42 Delegacion Cuauhtemoc Mexico D.F. 06048 ( 52-5 ) 535-0215 Fax : ( 52-5 ) 592-3571 Mexico ' s International Business Network 9454 Wilshire Blvd. , 6th Floor Beverly Hills , CA 90212 ( 310 ) 273-8558 Fax : ( 310 ) 273-2347 Trade Council Tlaxcala No . 177-803 Hipodromo Condesa Mexico D.F. 06170 ( 52-5 ) 286-8744 Fax : ( 52-5 ) 211-8465 U.S.-Mexico Chamber_of_Commerce 555 S . Flower St. , 25th Floor Los Angeles , CA 90071-2326 ( 213 ) 623-7725 Fax : ( 213 ) 623-0032 U.S.-Mexico Chamber_of_Commerce Camara de Comercio Mexico Estados-Unidos Homero No . 527-7er Piso Mexico D.F. 11570 ( 52-5 ) 250-7033 Fax : ( 52-5 ) 531-1590 MEXICO FAX INFORMATION Several fax services will send information directly to your fax machine . Here are five . Trade Commission of Mexico Information Service ( 213 ) 628-8966 Mexican Investment Board Faxline ( 602 ) 930-4802 Mexico Faxline ( 602 ) 235-9112 U.S. Dept . of Commerce Mexico Faxline ( 202 ) 482-4464 U.S. Dept . of the Treasury NAFTA Flashfax ( 202 ) 927-1692 Sources : Consulate General de Mexico ; United States-Mexico Chamber_of_Commerce ; Trade Commission of Mexico ; U.S. State_Department .
